title: Live updates via SSE
description:
Real-time board updates using Server-Sent Events:

SERVER:
- Watch .tick/issues/ with fsnotify
- SSE endpoint GET /api/events
- Stream tick change events: {type: 'update'|'create'|'delete', tick: {...}}
- Debounce rapid changes (100ms)

CLIENT:
- htmx SSE extension
- Connect to /api/events on load
- Update/add/remove cards on events
- Smooth CSS transitions for card moves
- Reconnect on disconnect

Replace polling approach (xa7).
acceptance_criteria:
- Changes in .tick/ appear on board within 500ms
- No polling - pure event-driven
- Cards animate when moving columns
- Handles reconnect gracefully
